## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [From peaks to genes](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/introduction/tutorials/galaxy-intro-peaks2genes/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
